scripts.dev:server: conc --kill-others "yarn workspace @rating-tracker/backend dev:run" "yarn workspace @rating-tracker/backend dev:watch" "yarn workspace @rating-tracker/frontend dev:vite" -n ",≫," -p "{name}" -c #339933,#FFCF00,#61DAFB --timings
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach -pv -j unlimited run test
scripts.test:tools: cat packages/backend/prisma/migrations/*/migration.sql > packages/backend/test/all_migrations.sql && conc --kill-others "yarn workspace @rating-tracker/backend test:tools" -n "" -p "{name}" -c grey --timings
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -pv -j unlimited run build
scripts.build:wasm:
wasm-pack build -s rating-tracker -d ../packages/wasm --release wasm && sed -E -i.bak 's/"module": "([A-Za-z0-9\-\.]+)",/"main": "\1",\
  "module": "\1",/g ; s/^}$/}\
/' packages/wasm/package.json && rm packages/wasm/package.json.bak
scripts.validate: yarn workspaces foreach -pv -j unlimited run typecheck && yarn eslint --color --cache --cache-strategy content --max-warnings 0 --ext .tsx,.ts packages/backend/src/ packages/commons/src/ packages/frontend/src/
scripts.validate:ci: yarn workspaces foreach -pv -j unlimited run typecheck && yarn eslint --color --cache --cache-location /.eslintcache --cache-strategy content --max-warnings 0 --ext .tsx,.ts packages/backend/src/ packages/commons/src/ packages/frontend/src/
